entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
